66639.「ホッホッホッ。そういうことでしたか。: Hohoho. So that's what you meant.

66640.「神代過ぎ～ 春の桜よ 無為に咲く～\n 清き風吹き 草木は芽吹く～。\n この:
Jingdai Passing~ Spring Cherry Blossoms, Blooming in Vain~ A Clear Wind Blows and Plants and Trees Sprout~. The word kiyokusa is
hidden in the bottom of this song.

66641.「それが指すのは かつてのカミハルムイであり\n ５０年前に 打ち捨てられた\n:
It points to what was once Kamiharmui, to the
throne of this castle that was abandoned fifty
years ago.

66642.「さすが 王者にふさわしき <cs_pchero>殿。\n このバショオ 感服い:
As expected of a champion <cs_pchero>.
Basho, I am very impressed with you.

66643.「さあ 玉座を調べ 王都カミハルムイに伝わる\n 王者の武具への道を 開かれよ。:
Now, examine the throne and open the way to
the royal armour of Royal City Kamiharmui.

69762.<cs_pchero>のもとに 天から\n光に包まれた武具が 降りてきた。:
Armaments wrapped in light came down from the
heavens to <cs_pchero>.
